description: It's that time again... Time to feed Cody Cummings another hot little chic. This week, Lea Lexis, a hot little Romanian girl gets to do the honors. If you thought that some of our other girls weren't kinky enough, then Lea will blow you away. Cody has a party with her. He even gets to stick it in her ass!Lets just say after getting of his lifetime, Cody needs a nap after this scene.Enjoy!
title: Blonde Bombshell
